channel.title: Fashion & Style
channel.description: Ongoing fashion and style news and reviews, along with Bill Cunningham's On the Street, slide shows and other multimedia.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2016 The New York Times Company

item.title: What Would You Serve With Gin and Juice? At the Table With Martha Stewart and Snoop Dogg
item.description: On their new television show, “Snoop & Martha’s Potluck Dinner Party,” an odd couple dispense wit and kitchen wisdom.
item.author: By MATTHEW SCHNEIER

item.title: What’s Selling Now in New York Stores
item.description: A sampling of the best sellers that have been flying off shelves and onto New York City streets.
item.author: By JEREMY ALLEN

item.title: The Tricky Etiquette of Co-Working Spaces
item.description: To get a glimpse of what manners will be like in the office of the future, it behooves us to look at the co-working spaces of today.
item.author: By HENRY ALFORD

item.title: Jennifer Grey Is Having the Time of Her Life
item.description: A night of dirty-ish dancing with the “Red Oaks” star.
item.author: By STEVEN McELROY

item.title: ‘Vanderpump Rules’ Pub Crawl
item.description: We tagged along on a boozy evening for fans with the stars of the Bravo show.

item.title: Deirdre Quinn: If a Meeting Starts at 9, Be There at 8
item.description: Ms. Quinn, chief of the women’s fashion site Lafayette 148 New York, says her pet peeve is lateness. When a meeting starts, she says, she closes the door.
item.author: By ADAM BRYANT

item.title: My U-Turn From Isolation to Intimacy
item.description: When her only child outgrows cuddling, a single mother realizes that her daily life is almost entirely without physical affection, or even touch, from anyone.
item.author: By MICHELLE FIORDALISO

item.title: Suket Dhir, Men’s Wear Designer, From Delhi to the World
item.description: A self-described former “slacker” who once sold mobile phones for AT&T has made himself into India’s rising fashion star.
item.author: By GUY TREBAY

item.title: Retail Magic in the Meatpacking District
item.description: Jeffrey Kalinsky, the founder of the Jeffrey boutiques, says, “To me, it’s all about the art of the sell.”
item.author: By MAX BERLINGER

item.title: The Joys and Pains of Shared Birthdays
item.description: Also, the etiquette of breast-feeding, where’s that wedding invitation, and the private reference letter.
item.author: By PHILIP GALANES
